reviews.review:
A real classic game.
I lost track about how many time I've spent playing CS

Épico, legendario, clásico... llamado como queráis, pero no le llaméis antiguo. Es todo un clásico del FPS y si en tu infancia no has jugado a este juego, no has tenido infancia.

FAYA IN DA JOLE!

Uno de los juegos online que mas a dado a comentar por decirlo de una manera este juego comenzo siendo la madre de los juegos On-line. De por si solo demuestra que estando en 2014 sigue con servidores y uno de los juegos mas jugados actualmente
Nota : 10/10

Not a game.
There will be no other FPS replaces CS
Лучший онлайн шуттер всех времен и народов
My very first online game played, I remember i played it when i were 7 only. And I got addicted to this game for more few years. It was really fun to play with my friends all the time i played it.

Super Spiel, es mag zwar alt sein, aber wieso muss dies gleich was negatives sein?
Counter-Strike kennt man nun mal, man joint einen Server und spielt. Es ist nun mal ein Klassiker, schade nur, dass viele ihn heutzutage nicht mehr kennen...

Better than CS:S but the community is much more spread out through servers so it's rare to see a full server. The modding community was also huge because Pawn was a more powerful language than SourcePawn. In CS:S there's a lot of dead servers but also a lot of full servers. Pretty kick ass game.

Can be run even on a rasberry pi.  Come play today!

An abslutly amazeing millitary team based tatical shooter. This is a great game for LAN parties and team vs team games. Also very fun to just play yourself online.
9.3/10

I'm proudly to say that i played this classic since Beta 4 and followed it's history to unknow mod to a blockbuster online game and to it's downfall (CS:GO).
It was one of a kind game at the time that featured detailed real weapons and real everyday maps. CS, i salute you!
Beste !!!!!!!! zu viele cheater leider T_T

Стоит ли играть в игру, которая старше тебя? Однозначно
Стоит ли встречаться с девушками, которые старше тебя? Сомнительно
Стоит ли встречаться с парнями, которые старше тебя? Точно нет
it's alright i mean it was one of best games of it's time and it's good if you don't have css
classic first shooter game, where friends come together and have fun

This is single handedly one of the best games ever made. Even in late 2011, when you enter a lobby its as if its 2000 again. Without a doubt, I'd give this game a 10/10 and highly recommend this game to any future buyers.
Muy buen juego, la verdad que si... Lo recomiendo
If you havent played Counter Strike you're not a gamer!
The best first person shooter of all time. 5/5
If you play anything else, your just gay.
Come play then rage quit because of mexicans and hackers
Inutile de faire un dessin: cs, c'est cs, ceux qui savent pas ce que c'est sont à coté de la plaque.
Всем поклонникам шутеров, посвящается. Родитель нынешней CS GO. Все здесь зависит от вашего скилла. 10 "да как убил" из 10.
If you don't have it, buy it now!
Eskise de bu oyun kadar zevk veren hangi oyun var ki?
1.6 will always be 1.6 and the best CS game <3

Who needs fancy-shmancy CoD graphics? It is not only the look of the game that makes things count, the gameplay and the endless replayability is what keeps this game going for over ten years. Like they say - simple yet brilliant! I recommend non-steamers to loosen up and spend those ten measly bucks for this bad boy.
Эта игра легендарная, практически, все 2 последних поколения выросли на ней, и я ничегот не имею против неё. КЛАСС! (Но сорс всё равно круче:))

After Quake's multiplayer, Counter-Strike 1.6, as it is known to many - set the standard in contests of dick measurement simulators. Also introduced bad voice acting and popular, amusing joke videos of stereotypical gamers to the internet.
https://youtu.be/VqB1uoDTdKM

Pros: No loot boxes or any competitive leaderboard things. Not as compelling as Global Offensive or even Counter-Strike Source.

Cons: Still a game that makes compelled people miserable.
Ahhhh CS 1.6 it is kind of dead now, but I couldn't begin to tell you how much time I ahve spent just playing this game. It is fun and takes actual skill, unlike that easy-mode CS:Source.
play counter-strike 1.6 and enjoy the game :D
Do I need to say why do I recommend this? Because this is freakin' awesome! That's why...!
Вот она игра - на все времена!
""Hands down the best CS game, mechanic wise. If you weren't playing this game you were doing drugs or at least more of it. It's crack for geeks; Good Times!"

The game that spawned numerous Counter-Strike "clones" since its release. Still entertaining after all these years.
